content:
I remember there was a PR try to make DiagnosticBuilder takes std::fmt::Arguments as arguments.
What was its result?
I think we're not touching any of the diagnostics infra and instead focussing on https://github.com/rust-lang/annotate-snippets-rs

thank for the answer.
Did you remember the PR that I described?
I don't remember anything about the PR except that I thought it was closed due to the above reason
